title: When will they realise we're living in the 20th century?
brief_description: John Cleese plays the roles of both the Shop Steward and the Production Director, each of whom tells his side of the story to the audience regarding a production dispute. As the film proceeds, the mistaken assumptions, actions and attitudes that precipitated the dispute are revealed. Suitable for upper secondary and tertiary levels.
